title: Mysterious World: The Short Story of a Boy on Another Planet
description: A teenage boy awakens in a ship and crash-lands in an alien planet. He does not remember anything from his past or who he even is. He finds himself fighting to survive against a galactic superpower and a villain named Taloc. Can he unravel the secrets of his past? And will he ever find out who the girl in the locket is?
author: Casey Smith
